title: My account got hacked, and i can no longer sign in
body: As the title says, my account got hacked. and for whatever reason now i cant sign in anymore, anyway i could get some help?

replies.body:
Hey there,

We actually have an article on our support site that talks all about recovering your account.

You can find it here:[ https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)

Hope that helps!
